stimulusHtml: Unlike earlier depictions of athletes from the culture in which it was produced, the seated boxer features wounds, scars, and a broken nose due to the period’s increased interest in

choicesHtml: trade and cultural exchange across Central and Southeast Asia
access to bronze and materials used to create sculptural detail
interest in emotional empathy and individual experience
political violence and warfare associated with imperial expansion
